c74object.name: hoa.fx.mixer~
c74object.description: hoa.fx.mixer~ helps to understand ambisonics and the behavior of the circular or spherical harmonics. This patcher requires to be loaded by a hoa.process~ object to work.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

c74object.discussion: hoa.fx.mixer~ helps to understand ambisonics and the behavior of the circular or spherical harmonics. This patcher requires to be loaded by a hoa.process~ object to work.

entry.name: More details

entry.name: Keywords
entry.description: ambisonics, hoa objects, audio, MSP, abstraction.
